about_the_game:
Manaulyn takes place on an Earth abandoned by Humans and taken over by Mythicals, creatures of folklore. Follow the moose as they search for their missing friend after a failed patrol to gather materials and magic water for the town.

“Manaulyn” is an action-adventure game in a fantasy-dystopian world. As a single-player mode game, the player can play as a moose to rescue a lost friend. The player has to survive the enemies living in the woods while searching for the missing friend. Mythicals will attack the character until they reach a dead end, where a lake holding magical water is guarded by both a hydra and a kraken.

The player, using the mouse and keyboard, can also use magic to combat any foes who dare to try and stop the player from achieving their goal. At the end of their journey, the main character will obtain the needed materials for their town and hopefully find their friend.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 (64bit)
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Manaulyn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GT or AMD HD 3870 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: An action-adventure game based around a moose rescuing a lost friend from a hydra and kraken. Shoot magic at the mythicals and take them out as you explore the forests of an abandoned Earth. Defeat the Kraken and Hydra to win the day.
